StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_TestUpdateMedicalExams]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@SSNPre.x varchar(9), @NumberToAdd int, @ExamDate date.me, @ExamType char(4), @MEPS varchar(20), @P char(1), @U char(1), @L char(1), @H char(1), @E char(1), @S char(1), @ColorVision char(1), @ColorDisposi.on char(1), @Le.CorrectedVision varchar(3), @RightCorrectedVision varchar(3), @Le.UncorrectedVision varchar(3), @RightUncorrectedVision varchar(3), @Height int, @Weight int, @Disposi.on char(1), @Consulta.onType varchar(2), @UserLogin varchar(15) = 'SA' AS
DECLARE @SSN char(9) DECLARE @MarineCandidateId int DECLARE @MEPS_ID int DECLARE @TranType varchar(8)
DECLARE @i int DECLARE @ErrMsg varchar(100)
DECLARE @Ini.alSSN char(9) DECLARE @FirstSSN char(9) DECLARE @LastSSN char(9) DECLARE @SSNMessage varchar(100) DECLARE @LenSSNPre.x int
DECLARE @DBID INT DECLARE @DBNAME NVARCHAR(128)
SET NOCOUNT ON
SELECT @DBID = DB_ID(), @DBNAME = DB_NAME()
--- MAKE SURE THE NUMBER OF PEOPLE TO BE CONTRACTED IS BETWEEN 1 AND 9999 IF @NumberToAdd NOT BETWEEN 1 AND 9999 BEGIN RAISERROR ('You must enter a number between 1 and 9999.', 16, 1, @DBID, @DBNAME) RETURN END
--- MAKE SURE THE SSN PREFIX IS 5 CHARACTERS LONG SET @LenSSNPre.x = LEN(@SSNPre.x)
--- IF THE SSN PREFIX IS LESS THAN 5 CHARACTERS LONG, APPEND 0's UNTIL IT'S 5 CHARACTERS LONG IF @LenSSNPre.x < 5 BEGIN SET @SSNPre.x = RTRIM(@SSNPre.x) + REPLICATE('0', 5 - LEN(@SSNPre.x)) END
--- INITIALIZE THE COUNTER SET @i = 1
SET @Ini.alSSN = CASE WHEN LEN(@SSNPre.x) = 9 THEN @SSNPre.x WHEN EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM PERSON P WHERE P.SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER LIKE @SSNPre.x + '%') THEN CONVERT(CHAR(9), CONVERT(INT, (SELECT MAX(P.SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER) FROM PERSON P WHERE P.SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER LIKE @SSNPre.x + '%') + 1)) ELSE @SSNPre.x + '0000' END
WHILE @i <= @NumberToAdd BEGIN --- DEFINE THE SSN FOR THE PERSON TO BE CONTRACTED SET @SSN = CONVERT(CHAR(9), CONVERT(INT, @Ini.alSSN) + (@i - 1))
IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM PERSON WHERE SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER = @SSN) BEGIN --- DEFINE THE PERSON ID SELECT @MarineCandidateId = PERSON_ID FROM PERSON WHERE SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER = @SSN
--- DEFINE THE MEPS_ID SELECT @MEPS_ID = MEPS_ORGANIZATION_ID FROM MEPS_ORGANIZATION_LOOKUP WHERE MEPS_NAME = @MEPS END ELSE BEGIN SET @ErrMsg = 'SSN ' + @SSN + ' does not exist in the system.' RAISERROR (@ErrMsg, 16, 1, @DBID, @DBNAME) RETURN END
BEGIN TRANSACTION
IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM CANDIDATE_MEDICAL_EXAM CME WHERE CME.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = @MarineCandidateId AND CME.MEDICAL_EXAM_TYPE = @ExamType AND CME.MEDICAL_EXAM_DATE = @ExamDate) BEGIN --- DEFINE THE TRANSACTION TYPE SET @TranType = 'upda.ng'
--- UPDATE THE MEDICAL EXAM UPDATE CANDIDATE_MEDICAL_EXAM SET MEPS_ORGANIZATION_ID = @MEPS_ID, P_GENERAL_BODY_BUILD = @P, U_UPPER_BODY = @U, L_LOWER_BODY = @L, H_HEARING = @H, E_EYES = @E, S_MENTAL_PSYCHOLOGICAL = @S, VISUAL_COLOR = @ColorVision, LEFT_CORR_VISUAL_ACUITY = @Le.CorrectedVision, RIGHT_CORR_VISUAL_ACUITY = @RightCorrectedVision, LEFT_UNCORR_VISUAL_ACUITY = @Le.UncorrectedVision, RIGHT_UNCORR_VISUAL_ACUITY = @RightUncorrectedVision, HEIGHT = @Height, WEIGHT = @Weight, MEDICAL_DISPOSITION = @Disposi.on, CONSULTATION_TYPE = @Consulta.onType, USER_LOGIN = @UserLogin, UPDATE_DATE = GETDATE() WHERE MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = @MarineCandidateId AND MEDICAL_EXAM_TYPE = @ExamType AND MEDICAL_EXAM_DATE = @ExamDate END ELSE BEGIN --- DEFINE THE TRANSACTION TYPE SET @TranType = 'adding'
--- INSERT THE MEDICAL EXAM INSERT INTO CANDIDATE_MEDICAL_EXAM (MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID, MEDICAL_EXAM_DATE, MEDICAL_EXAM_TYPE, MEPS_ORGANIZATION_ID, P_GENERAL_BODY_BUILD, U_UPPER_BODY, L_LOWER_BODY, H_HEARING, E_EYES, S_MENTAL_PSYCHOLOGICAL, VISUAL_COLOR, VISUAL_COLOR_DISPOSITION, LEFT_CORR_VISUAL_ACUITY, RIGHT_CORR_VISUAL_ACUITY, LEFT_UNCORR_VISUAL_ACUITY, RIGHT_UNCORR_VISUAL_ACUITY, HEIGHT, WEIGHT, MEDICAL_DISPOSITION, CONSULTATION_TYPE, USER_LOGIN, UPDATE_DATE) VALUES (@MarineCandidateId, @ExamDate, @ExamType, @MEPS_ID, @P, @U, @L, @H, @E, @S, @ColorVision, @ColorDisposi.on, @Le.CorrectedVision, @RightCorrectedVision, @Le.UncorrectedVision, @RightUncorrectedVision, @Height, @Weight, @Disposi.on, @Consulta.onType, @UserLogin, GETDATE()) END
IF @@ERROR != 0 OR @@ROWCOUNT = 0 BEGIN ROLLBACK TRANSACTION
SET @ErrMsg = 'An error occurred ' + @TranType + ' the medical exam record for SSN ' + @SSN + '.' RAISERROR (@ErrMsg, 16, 2, @DBID, @DBNAME) RETURN END
--- IF WE MAKE IT HERE COMMIT THE TRANSACTION COMMIT TRANSACTION
SELECT @FirstSSN = CASE @i WHEN 1 THEN @SSN ELSE @FirstSSN END, @LastSSN = CASE WHEN @i BETWEEN 1 AND @NumberToAdd THEN @SSN ELSE @LastSSN END
--- INCREMENT THE COUNTER SET @i = @i + 1 END
SET NOCOUNT OFF
--- DEFINE THE MESSAGE TO DISPLAY SET @SSNMessage = CASE WHEN (@FirstSSN IS NOT NULL AND LEN(@FirstSSN) = 9) AND (@LastSSN IS NOT NULL AND LEN(@LastSSN) = 9) THEN 'Medical Exams for SSN ' + @FirstSSN + ' to ' + @LastSSN + '.' ELSE SPACE(0) END
IF @SSNMessage IS NOT NULL AND LEN(@SSNMessage) > 0 BEGIN PRINT @SSNMessage END
